event.title: thought to be typhoid fever but now

data.event: The illness, first thought to be typhoid fever but now more likely a haemorrhagic fever, was first noticed in early June in Kasai Occidental province in the DRC.
The illness, first thought to be typhoid fever but now more likely a haemorrhagic fever, was first noticed in early June in Kasai Occidental province in the DRC.

event.title: most of the cases have been in children under ten years

data.event: They also indicated that most of the cases have been in children under ten years of age.

event.title: death is approximately five to seven days

data.event: The time from onset to death is approximately five to seven days.

event.title: the deaths of two village chiefs on June 8

data.event: Dr. Kanow described the first reported cases as involving the deaths of two village chiefs on June 8.
